thread.section_title: The Wall Street Journal & Breaking News, Business, Financial and Economic News, World News and Video
thread.title: Tariff Showdown Shifts to Intense Negotiation Period

author: Josh Zumbrun
title: Tariff Showdown Shifts to Intense Negotiation Period
text:
WASHINGTON—The Trump administration’s tit-for-tat with Beijing over potential tariffs has ushered in a high-stakes standoff over the future of trade between the world’s two largest economies.
The combatants will now follow a timeline stretching over the next half year, during which the two sides will seek to negotiate a new normal. President Donald Trump, who initiated the tensions over Chinese trade practices, has put himself in a position to face mounting pressures from lawmakers, an intense campaign from corporate lobbyists,...
